segment.text: Data should relate to all sites in England, Scotland and Wales of the following business:
You must return your data using our Telephone Data Entry (TDE) service. Freephone 0800 0858163 Your Respondent Identification Number:
context: You will be asked to enter your data using the telephone keypad in the order listed below. Please retain a copy of your data for future reference.

segment.text: For future queries about this call, please quote your reference number
On 12 June 2015 what was the number of employees for the business named above?
segment.context: An employee is anyone aged 16 years or over that your organisation directly pays from its payroll(s), in return for carrying out a full-time or part-time job or being on a training scheme.
inclusions: all workers paid directly from this business's payroll(s)
those temporarily absent but still being paid, for example on maternity leave.
exclusions: agency workers paid directly from the agency payroll
former employees only receiving a pension
working owners who are not paid via PAYE.

question.text: Male employees working more than 30 hours per week?
Male employees working 30 hours or less per week?
Female employees working more than 30 hours per week?
Female employees working 30 hours or less per week?
For the period 1 June 2015 to 30 June 2015 what was the value of the business's turnover excluding VAT and excise duties?
question.context: If your figures do not relate to the exact calendar month, please provide us with the dates you are reporting for. Please round your figure to the nearest Â£ thousand. Even if your turnover is zero, please still complete a return using the TDE system. If an exact figure is not available, please provide a careful estimate.
inclusions: costs incurred and passed on to customers
sales of goods purchased for resale
revenue earned from other parts of the business, not named at the top of this page (please supply at fair value).
exclusions: gains on sales of fixed capital assets
